Backgrounds & Settings

New Game

Reset the board instantly without touching your high score.

Block Sets

Swap between curated shape collections. Scores persist per set.
Custom Block Sets

Design new collections, preview rotations, and store them in your browser.

Use #, X, or 1 for filled cells. Duplicate rotations are dimmed automatically.

Shapes in this set

Import from another set

Copy every shape (and its allowed rotations) from another block set, then prune individual pieces below.

Create your first custom block set to get started.

Custom Backgrounds

Design or paste shaders, then save and reuse them.

Paste any WebGL fragment shader. Supported uniforms: iResolution, iTime, iTimeDelta, iFrame, iFrameRate, iMouse, iDate, iChannelTime[4], iChannelResolution[4]. Legacy extras: u_time, u_resolution, varying v_uv.
